typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		colum1 as string,
		colum2 as string,
		colum3 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(colum1 = iif(instr(colum1, ",")>0 , concat('"',colum1, '"'), colum1)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		abc0 as string,
		abc1 as string,
		abc2 as string
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	quoteAll: true) ~> sink1
